mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , BLOCK_YN , LOGIN_CNT , LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LATEST_ACCESS_IP , REGIST_DATE) VALUES (#{email} , #{name} , #{password} , #{salt} , 'N' /*BLOCK_YN*/ , 0 /*LOGIN_CNT*/ , NULL /*LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE*/ , NULL /*LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE*/ , NULL /*LATEST_ACCESS_IP*/ , SYSDATE /*REGIST_DATE*/)
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , BLOCK_YN , LOGIN_CNT , LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LATEST_ACCESS_IP , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGIST_DATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET BLOCK_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND LOGIN_CNT >= 3
